Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.examples

package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.examples

A very simple example of implementation of the rendezvous pattern.

A control (CtrlNode) exchanges 40 messages with a 'simulator' node (SimNode). 4 threads are used to process the 4 message types. Run or debug Main.main() to see the pattern in action.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 2 juin 2021
See Also:
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CtrlNode
    An example 'controller' node.
    Main
    Use this class main(...) method to run a very minimalistic example of use of the Rendezvous pattern as implemented here.
    SimNode
    An example 'simulator' node.
